name: Vojo
description:
Vojo - is a casual game in which you move forward through a tunnel. Your task is to collect the white cubes that appear on your way, for each cube you get one point. The difficulty is that obstacles also appear on your way that you need to avoid, because if you crash into them, you will immediately lose and you will have to start over. Use your reaction speed and calculate the path. How many points can you collect?

Features:

- Simple gameplay

- Minimalistic graphics

- Pleasant music
